definitions.title: n.m.
definitions.body: :La 3:18 eminence, enduring, everlastingness, perpetuity ([[לנחח]] Sir 40:14 as 4 infr.);—[[נֵ֫חַח]] 1Sa 15:29 + 3 t.; [[נֶ֫חַח]] Am 1:11 + 36 t.; sf. [[נִחְחִי]] La 3:18; pl. [[נְחָחִים]] 34:10; —
eminence: [[נחח ישׂראל]] the Eminence of Israel (´[[י]]) 1Sa 15:29 (Dr:Sam. 98 glory of Israel); attribute of God 1Ch 29:11 (‖[[הוד]],[[תפארת ]] et al.).
enduring of life, and so life itself as enduring: [[אָבַד נִחְחִי]] La 3:18 my endurance doth vanish (De sap of life, v. II. ´[[נ]]).
endurance in time: ´[[משׁאות נ]] Ps 74:3 perpetual desolations; [[יְדַבֵּר]] ´[[לנ]] Pr 21:28 speaketh continually (?; v. Toy); ´[[עד־נ]] Ps 49:20 unto the end (a long duration), so Jb Job 34:36.

everlastingness, ever, usu. [[לָנֶחַח]] for ever, 2Sa 2:26, Is 13:20, Is 25:8, Is 28:28, Is 33:20, Is 57:16, Je 3:5, Je 50:39, Am 8:7, Hb Hab 1:4, Ps 9:7, Ps 9:19, Ps 10:11, Ps 44:24, Ps 49:10, Ps 52:7, Ps 68:17, Ps 74:1, Ps 74:10, Ps 74:19, Ps 77:9, Ps 79:5, Ps 89:47, Ps 103:9, Job 4:20, Job 14:20, Job 20:7, Job 23:7, Job 36:7, La 5:20; [[לנחח נחחים]] (cf. [[עולם עולמים]]) Is 34:10; seldom abbr. [[נֶחַח]] Am 1:11 (´[[לָנ]] LXX We Now GASm), Je 15:18, Ps 13:2, Ps 16:11.
